What is the meaning of “state” when referring to stateful inspection in firewalls?
CorrectAnswer: It refers to the connection state of a conversation between two computers.
Option1: It refers to the connection state of a computer to the network.
Option2: It refers to the two firewall rules needed, one for the sender and one for the recipient.
Option3: It refers to the inspection of the traffic payload and forwarding on to its destination.
